instruction: Rearrange the sentences into a coherent story, output the story.
input: (1) The family set off on holiday. (2) They stopped off for a picnic in the park. (3) On the horizon, a rainbow appeared. (4) They waited for the rain to stop.
output: The family set off on holiday and stopped off for a picnic in the park. As they waited for the rain to stop, a rainbow appeared on the horizon.
